title: Daily Trello Task Deadline Digests to Slack
description:
Automatically pulls tasks from your Trello board and sends a daily summary to Slack.  
Perfect for staying on top of admin tasks, due dates, and project updates without leaving Slack.  


## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Connect Trello (Developer API)
1. Get your **API key** here ‚Üí [Trello App Key](https://trello.com/app-key)  
2. On the same page, generate a **Token** (click **Token**).  
3. In n8n ‚Üí **Credentials ‚Üí New ‚Üí Trello API** ‚Üí paste **API Key** + **Token**, then save.  
4. Open each Trello node (**Get Board**, **Get Lists**, **Get Cards**) and select your Trello credential.  

---

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Connect Slack
1. Go to [Slack API Apps](https://api.slack.com/apps) and create a new app.  
2. Add **OAuth & Permissions** ‚Üí include scopes like:  
   - `chat:write` (to send messages)  
   - `users:read` (if targeting specific users)  
3. Install the app to your workspace ‚Üí copy the **Bot User OAuth Token**.  
4. In n8n ‚Üí **Credentials ‚Üí New ‚Üí Slack OAuth2 API** ‚Üí paste the token and save.  
5. In your **Slack node** (e.g., *Send a message*), select your Slack credential, and choose whether to send messages to a **channel** or a **user**.  

---

### 3Ô∏è‚É£ Add Your Board URL to ‚ÄúGet Board‚Äù
1. Copy your Trello board URL (e.g. `https://trello.com/b/DCpuJbnd/administrative-tasks`).  
2. Open the **Get Board** node ‚Üí set:  
   - **Resource**: `Board`  
   - **Operation**: `Get`  
   - **ID** ‚Üí choose **URL mode** and paste the board link.  
3. This node will return the board `id` ‚Üí used by **Get Lists** / **Get Cards** nodes.  

---
